JOB DETAILS :

Company Profile: This is the world largest Multimedia Company which was established in Canada. They gather financial, legal, accounting and other documents.


Position: French Customer Support Representative
Industry: Media Industry
Salary: Negotiable
Location: BGC, Taguig City
Schedule: Night Shift (Central Time) | Weekends off
Work Set up: Hybrid : 2x a week in the office and 3x at home


Requirements:
• Open for native French Speakers residing in the Philippines
• Preferably Bachelor’s Degree Holder of Any course
• At Least 1-2 years’ experience in Customer Service is a highly advantage
• Good communications skills is a plus
• Willing to work on a hybrid setup (2 days working on-site and 3 days working at home
• Willing to work on a night shift


Responsibilities:
• Respond to customers; inquiries via phone, email and chat.
• Collect and forward feedback to design and development to facilitate continuous product improvement
• Ensure, where appropriate, information gained from handling supports queries is promoted to the knowledge base and communicated to interested parties.
• Take initiative to recommend and implement quality process improvements


Recruitment Process:
• Paper Screening
• HR Interview
• English Online Assessment
• HM Interview
• Language Assessment
• Job Offer
